actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress and certain officers of the United States, other than mailings related to the closing of their official business, after such Members or officers have left office.

summary.text: Changes the time period during which Members of Congress and certain Federal officers, whose terms have expired, may send franked mailings to the 90 day period immediately following the date on which they leave office. Restricts the purpose of such mailings to the closing of official business.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress and certain officers of the United States, other than mailings related to the closing of their official business, after such Members or officers have left office.
